original_text: When ye blow an alarm the second time, then the camps that lie on the south side shall take their journey: they shall blow an alarm for their journeys.
korean_text: 두 번째로 크게 불 때에는 남쪽 진영들이 행진할 것이라 떠나려 할 때에는 나팔 소리를 크게 불 것이며

sentences.original_text: When ye blow an alarm the second time
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 두 번째로 경고를 불 때

sentences.original_text: then the camps that lie on the south side
they shall blow an alarm for their journeys
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여정을 위해 경고를 불 것이다
